#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long int a[105][105];
int dp[105][105];
int main()
{
    int test,m,n,i,j,ans;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    while(test--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        scanf("%d",&a[i][j]);
        i=1;j=1;
        ans=0;
        while(1)
        {
            if(i==m&&j==n)
            break;
            if(i+1>m&&j+1<=n)
            {
                if(a[i][j+1]==2147483647)
                break;
              ans++;
              j++;
              continue;
            }
            if(j+1>n&&i+1<=m)
            {
                if(a[i+1][j]==2147483647)
                break;
                ans++;
                i++;
                continue;
            }
            if(a[i+1][j]==2147483647&&a[i][j+1]==2147483647)
            break;
            if(a[i][j+1]==2147483647)
            {
                ans++;
                i++;
                continue;
            }
            if(a[i+1][j]==2147483647)
            {
                ans++;
                j++;
                continue;
            }
            if(a[i+1][j]<a[i][j+1])
            {
                i++;
                ans++;
            }
            else if(a[i][j+1]<a[i+1][j])
            {
                j++;
                ans++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
